description: This file is a PHP web page source code for managing port management rules in a network device's web interface. It includes PHP code, HTML markup, JavaScript for dynamic interactions, and references to external includes and AJAX handlers.

methods.name: initPmFields
methods.description: Populates the port management rules table and initializes UI elements upon page load.

methods.name: initEvents
methods.description: Sets up event handlers for UI interactions such as enable/disable rules, delete, add, and change rule type.

methods.name: ondelete
methods.description: Handles deletion of a port management rule via AJAX.

methods.name: onenable
methods.description: Enables or disables a specific port management rule via AJAX.

methods.name: ondisableAll
methods.description: Enables or disables all port management rules via AJAX.

methods.name: onchangeRuleType
methods.description: Changes the port management rule type via AJAX.

methods.name: onchangePmDisable
methods.description: Enables or disables the entire port management UI based on the disable all checkbox.
